name: Population & Infrastructure
desc: The basic infrastructure required to support a given population, from rickety orbital hab-modules to megacities and everything between.

name: Mining
desc: Metal and metalloid ores, organics, and volatile compounds all require heavy equipment, special infrastructure, and a skilled workforce to extract. The harsh work attracts a certain type, and an administration that's not willing to look the other way now and again may find itself running short of willing personnel.
